rukus.text: 71|1|nihsandeh, hamane bheja noohî€¼ ko usakee jaati kee or ki saavadhaan kar apanee jaati ko, isase poorv ki aaye unake paas, doohkhadaayee yaatana.
71|2|usane kahaah he meree jaati! vaastav mein, main khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon, tumhen.
71|3|ki ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee tatha daro usase aur baat maano meree.

71|4|vah kshama kar dega tumahaare lie tumhaare paapon ko tatha avasar dega tumhen nirdhaarit samay[1] tak. vaastav mein, jab allaah ka nirdhaarit samay aa jaayega, to usamen der na hogee. kaash tum jaanate
71|5|noohî€¼ ne kahaah mere paalanahaar! mainne bulaaya apanee jaati ko (teree or) raat aur din.
71|6|to mere bulaave ne unake bhaagane hee ko adhik kiya.
71|7|aur mainne jab-jab unhen bulaaya, to unhonne de leen apanee ungaliyaan apane kaanon mein tatha odh lie apane kapade[1] tatha ade rah gaye aur bada ghamand kiya.
71|8|phir mainne unhen uchch svar mein bulaaya.
71|9|phir mainne unase khulakar kaha aur unase dheere-dheere (bhee) kaha.
71|10|mainne kahaah kshama maango apane paalanahaar se, vaastav mein vah bada kshamaasheel hai.
71|11|vah varsha karega aakaash se tumapar dhaaraapravaah varsha.
71|12|tatha adhik dega tumhen putr tatha dhan aur bana dega tumhaare lie baag tatha naharen.
71|13|kya ho gaya hai tumhen ki nahin darate ho allaah kee mahima se
71|14|jabaki usane paida kiya hai tumhen vibhinn prakaar[1] se.
71|15|kya tumane nahin dekha ki kaise paida kiye hain allaah ne saat aakaash, oopar-tale
71|16|aur banaaya hai chandrama ko unamen prakaash aur banaaya hai soory ko pradeep.
71|17|aur allaah hee ne ugaaya hai tumhen dharatee[1] se adbhut roop se.
71|18|phir vah vaapas le jaayega tumhen usamen aur nikaalega tumhen usase.
71|19|aur allaah ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko bistar.
71|20|taaki tum chalo usakee khulee raahon mein.
